getList

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getList(java.lang.String path)
Get a list of strings from preferences. The list is stored as a size property end element_N properties with N being the element index.

Parameters:
path - The absolute path name of the node.
Returns:
The list of strings.

getNode

public static java.util.prefs.Preferences getNode(java.lang.String path)
Get node for package and path, return null if not already existing.

Parameters:
path - The absolute path name of the node.
Returns:
The node or null, if node does not exist or failure in the backing store.

putList

public static void putList(java.lang.String path,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
Put a list of strings to preferences. The list is stored as a size property end element_N properties with N being the element index.

Parameters:
path - The absolute path name of the node.
list - The list of strings.
